name: Controller
description: Natural or legal person that determines purpose and means of processing

name: Processor
description: Entity processing personal data on behalf of controller

name: Consumer
description: Virginia resident acting in individual or household context

name: Child
description: Natural person younger than 13 years of age

name: Parent or Legal Guardian
description: Parent or legal guardian of a child

name: Third Party
description: Person other than consumer controller processor or affiliates
